name: AirC.A.T
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34

Goto Ludum Dare Page

This game is about a cat and a group of *ugly* birds.

Theme selection:
Two button controls

Controls:
LMouse, A, F or LCtrl = Button 1
RMouse, D, J or RCtrl = Button 2

Weapons:
Normal bullets: Press any button to fire a bullet.
Arrow: Hold a button to charge the bow, then press the other button to shoot.
Laser: Hold a button then release.
Nuke: Hold both button then release.

Note:
Each weapon has its own indicator.
Press any button can make your character stop. Try to find some trick to avoid bullets.
